name: OXO Good Grips Salad Spinner, Fruit Washer and Lettuce Spinner
short_description: One-handed pump for fast drying: OXO invented the one-touch Salad Spinner for effortless, efficient drying of lettuce, greens, and more Smart design, better performance: Pump with one touch to spin your produce dry, then stop the basket instantly with a push of our patented brake Non-slip base for added control: Keeps the Salad Spinner firmly in place while you pump—no slipping or sliding Stores flat with lockable lid: Press the pump down and slide the storage lock into place. This holds the pump flush with the lid for convenient stacking and storing Spin, strain and serve: Basket doubles as a vegetable strainer and serving bowl, perfect for prepping or storing greens OXO Salad Spinner lid comes apart for easy cleaning: Reduces moisture, all parts are top-rack dishwasher safe
product_description: A new spin on our classic Salad Spinner. Before the introduction of the OXO Good Grips Salad Spinner in 1998, crank and pull-tab lettuce spinners were considered high-end kitchen tools—some people even used the spin cycle of their washing machine to dry greens. Our easy-to-use, one-handed pump transformed the Salad Spinner into an everyday fruit and vegetable cleaner. Nearly 20 years later, we revisited the original with smart updates—like the patented brake—while keeping the features people love and staying true to the original inspiration: a children’s top. With a modern design that fits contemporary kitchens and an improved brake that stops the basket instantly, we think you’ll love this upgraded classic. Dry salad greens fast with a simple press of the soft, non-slip pump. The non-slip base keeps the bowl steady on your countertop while you spin, and the built-in brake button makes it easy to stop and unload. The basket doubles as a colander, and the lid comes apart for easy cleaning. All parts are dishwasher safe. Bowl capacity: 6.22 qt / 5.9 L Basket capacity: 4.4 qt / 4.1 L Dishwasher safe.

name: Large Salad Spinner with Lid, 5 Qt Capacity, Manual Vegetable Dryer with Double-Lock Handle, Quick and Easy Multi-Use Lettuce Spinner, Vegetable Dryer, Fruit Washer
short_description: LARGE CAPACITY: 4.5-quart salad spinner with clear outer bowl, lime green inner basket, and white lid - perfect for washing and drying greens, vegetables, and fruits PREMIUM MATERIALS: Features durable PP inner strainer basket, AS clear outer bowl, and ABS lid construction for long-lasting performance ERGONOMIC DESIGN: Double-buckle rounded handle provides comfortable grip while the smooth-spinning mechanism enables effortless 360-degree rotation COMPACT SIZE: Measures 9.5 x 8.6 x 8 inches, making it ideal for kitchen countertops while providing ample capacity for family-sized salads EFFICIENT DRAINAGE: Vertical slotted design maximizes water removal while protecting delicate produce from damage during spinning

name: KitchenAid Universal Salad Spinner with Removable Bowl, Colander and One Handed Pump Mechanism, Large Bowl Nests and Features Non Slip Base, 7.43 Quart, Empire Red
short_description: HEALTHY EATING MADE EASY: quickly and effortlessly clean and dry salad greens, fruits, vegetables, and more; spinning design keeps lettuce crisp while washing EASY-TO-USE: soft-touch pump mechanism and brake button provide comfortable, one-handed operation; simply press pump mechanism to spin and tap brake button to stop VERSATILE: use the basket separately as a colander, or use the bowl for serving salads SIMPLE STORAGE: lock secures pump mechanism in the lid and pieces nest for easy storage in a cabinet or drawer STABLE & SECURE: bowl features a nonslip base to keep spinner in place and surfaces from getting scratched
product_description: Quickly and effortlessly clean and dry salad greens, fruits, and vegetables with this KitchenAid Salad Spinner. The spinning design keeps lettuce crisp while washing. The soft-touch pump mechanism and brake button provide comfortable, one-handed operation--simply press the pump mechanism to spin and tap the brake button to stop. The lock secures the pump mechanism in the lid and pieces nest for easy storage in a cabinet or drawer. The bowl features a nonslip base to keep the salad spinner in place and countertops from getting scratched. Use the basket separately as a colander, or use the bowl for serving salads. Hand wash only.

name: Farberware Easy to use pro Pump Spinner with Bowl, Colander and Built in draining System for Fresh, Crisp, Clean Salad and Produce, 6.6 quart, Green
short_description: HEALTHY MADE EASY: Our Pro Pump Salad Spinner makes it so easy to prepare nutritious foods every night of the week; large salad spinner helps you to clean and serve salad greens and other produce, including fruits and even berries in seconds MULTIPLE USES: This lettuce spinner is more than just a device for quickly rinsing and drying produce; use the basket separately as a colander, and the clear plastic bowl can be used as a large salad bowl or mixing bowl ENOUGH FOR EVERYONE: The generous capacity of our salad spinner (6.65 quart bowl, 5.25 quart basket) means you can put in enough food to feed your entire family SO EASY: We know you're busy when it comes to making meals, so we've engineered our large salad spinner for convenient one-handed operation; simply push down on the spinner mechanism to begin; then tap the brake button when done STABLE AND SECURE: The clear bowl features a soft, non-slip base to secure the salad spinner while in use, with the added bonus of protecting your countertops from getting scratched
product_description: Farberware makes healthy eating quick and easy with the Pro Pump Salad Spinner, a must-have kitchen tool for preparing fresh, crisp salads and produce in seconds. This versatile salad spinner allows you to thoroughly wash and dry your favorite greens, herbs, fruits, and even delicate berries quickly and conveniently—all in one bowl. Simply place your produce in the removable basket, rinse thoroughly, secure the lid, and use the one-handed, soft-touch pump mechanism to spin your salad dry with minimal effort. The powerful pump action removes excess water efficiently, while the non-slip base keeps the spinner securely in place during use, preventing sliding on countertops. When you’re ready to stop spinning, the soft-touch brake button halts the rotation instantly for complete control. For added convenience, the basket doubles as a colander and the clear bowl can be used separately as an attractive serving dish. This space-saving, multi-purpose design makes it easy to enjoy fresh, healthy meals every day. Measures 10.31 inches x 10.31 inches x 7.44 inches. Hand wash only.

name: Kitexpert Effective Large Salad Spinner 6.3 Qt,Easy to use pro Pump Spinner with Bowl, One-Handed Pump Dishwasher Safe Multiple Use Spinner-Black
short_description: FAMILY SIZE SALAD SPINNER: The large salad spinner can help you cut down on busy cooking time and makes cooking a breeze. This lettuce spinner has a large 6.3Qt capacity bowl and a 5 qt basket, it can make 4-7 servings of salad at a time. The salad washer spinner and dryer can be used by one person or for the whole family/entertaining guests. VEGETABLE DRYING IN SECONDS: Our encrypted screw makes it spin faster and longer, separating and removing water from vegetables in seconds. When you press the handle, the spinning colander will rotate smoothly at a high speed, creating a centrifugal force that will separate and remove water from vegetables in seconds.The salad spinner collapsible's pump handle is so effortless to press that even children can easily operate it. SO EASY&ONE-HANDED OPERATION: Simply press the brake button for a few seconds to dump and stop spinning. The non-slip ring and wide base keep the bowl stable on the countertop for enhanced operational safety. The salad/fruit dryer spinner is also designed with a convenient built-in pump handle lock for easy storage, saving more space in your kitchen. PERFECT GIFT & MULTIFUNCTIONAL: The fruit washer spinner is made of safe and harmless materials, allowing you to use the basket as a colander on its own, and the clear plastic bowl can be used as a large salad bowl or mixing bowl. Suitable for vegetarians, salad lovers, mothers, housewives, and those you care for at weddings, engagements, new home move-ins, and more. KITEXPERT's SERVICES: We provide high-quality products and services, including no-excuse refunds and exchange services, if you have any questions during the purchase process please feel free to contact us, we are always here for you.

name: 5 Gallon Commercial Salad Spinner Salad Dryer Remove Excess Water for Crisp & Fresh Salad Sealed Gearbox Built-in Brake System Durable Spinner Mechanism for Restaurants & Catering by Chef Master 90005
short_description: WHY USE A SALAD DRYER? A salad dryer/spinner is designed to remove any excess water left on salad greens after washing. This prevents lettuce from becoming soggy which leads to discoloring and spoiling BUILT-IN BRAKING SYSTEM - The Chef Master 90005 salad dryer is designed with a built in braking system. Once you stop winding the gears round, the brake will kick in and slow the gears to a stop DURABLE ALUMINUM CRANK & GEARS - All the working parts in this salad spinner are made from durable materials that are designed to last CAPACITY OF 5 GALLONS - This salad spinner has a very large capacity. It can fit 5-6 heads of lettuce at one time. It can be loaded with chopped lettuce or separated greens HEAVY DUTY CONSTRUCTION - The Chef Master Salad Spinner is made with heavy duty, food safe materials. This dryer meets E.T.L and F.D.A standards
